title: Weekly NFT Sales Dip — Ethereum Outshines Bitcoin, Solana and Avalanche Record Gains
description: The latest statistics indicate a further decline in non-fungible token (NFT) sales this week, showing a 5.05% decrease compared to the previous week. Sales of NFTs reached $297 million, with Ethereum leading the way this week. Ethereum’s sales amounted to $106 million, overtaking Bitcoin’s $70 million in sales over the same seven-day period. Ethereum Leads […]

title: IBM, Westpac-backed blockchain project Lygon to liquidate
description: Lygon, a startup backed by major financial institutions, has gone bankrupt. Its debt hovers at around $14.3 million.
